price: নিশ্চয় আমিয়েই কোৰআন অৱতীৰ্ণ কৰিছোঁ আৰু নিশ্চয় আমিয়েই ইয়াৰ সংৰক্ষক।
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā al-dhik'ra wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
